title: Psychedelics and the Untimely Fruit of the Tree:  Beware the Premature or Unearned Insight
description:
Karen and Mark comment on The Four Horsemen of Meaning, beginning with the section on Psychedelics and then returning to the beginning discussion of the four definitions of Meaning.
First section starts at 55:40 and second section on Meaning starts at 4:30.  https://youtu.be/FCvQsqSCWjA

If you like this content, here's a playlist of Mark and Karen discussing the Jordan Peterson and John Vervaeke conversation that was classified as "almost psychedelic".  
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLoARw9zo4EUYEEhM_KIgzl_eW9ZZTHbzh

A note from Mark Lefebvre:

YouTube channel:  Navigating Patterns:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgIbaWd7raqeIGUS1cHNgPg/videos

John Vervaeke makes all of these conversations possible for me and others. Thank you so much John!
Join us on the Awakening From the Meaning Crisis discord, where we have great conversations every day and a number of practices you can participate in!
https://discord.gg/3TmZCGyQz7

The Meaning Community is our website project to showcase the work of John Vervaeke and hub for all the sites related to addressing the meaning crisis!
Copies of the slide are here as well! Come and participate with us as we build a community of like minded individuals working on the issues around meaning.
https://meaningcommunity.com/
